description:
What could be more obnoxious than one Steve? How about two? Steve discovers he`s had a shadowy body double all along, who now wants to be something more! Meanwhile, a sinister conspirator discovers the persuasive power of a turn of phrase, and Pascal composes a verse to help a student in need.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cavematsu-san / Choromatsu and Ichimatsu / Totoko`s Challenge
Genshimatsu-san / Choromatsu to Ichimatsu / Totoko no Chousen
げんし松さん / チョロ松と一松 / トト子の挑戦
